//: Displaces older teargas recipe.  Conventional teargas grenades generally aren't trichloramine.
You cut the tube to make the bomb.

As someone explained to me in the discord server, you could only realistically use only volatile explosives to make a bomb if the case is hard, which is the reason why I'm allowing it on pipebombs and grenades, but not in bombs which use gallon jugs. Additionally, the biggest reason why you wouldn't make a large bomb with only volatile explosives is that the high volume concentration would make it extremely likely that minimal friction might detonate the entire system, which is the reason why I'm allowing it on smaller explosives, but not on the largest like the barrel bombs.
Assumes standard 9 pellet 00 load. 1166 mg gunpowder rounded to 12 100 mg 'pieces'
